segments.text: Excuse me . Is there any body here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've finished up all my water . I would kill for a sip of water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . Are you here alone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My father and sister are out to photographing . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It means a hiker who loves traveling around the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool . You must have been to a lot of places .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , actually almost half of all the countries over the world . I love traveling places .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So cool . I want to be a back-packer when I grow up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can do it . But do work hard on your English to make it easier .
segments.speaker: S1
